title: saucectl api testing runner configuration
description: Configuration file for api testing using saucectl

suites.description: The set of properties providing details about the test suites to run.

name.description: The name of the test suite, which will be reflected in the test results in Sauce Labs.

hookId.description: Your project's hook ID, which you can create and/or retrieve from your project's Webhooks tab.

testMatch.description: Paths to the api-testing test folders. Regex values are supported to indicate all folders of a certain directories, etc.

tests.description: A list of test IDs to run for the project defined by hookId.

tags.description: A test tag to run for the project defined by hookId.

useRemoteTests.description: Use tests stored in the cloud instead of the local ones.
